questions.text: what is the first thing that gets Kyle Keely grounded for a week?
questions.answer: Taking a short-cut through his mother's favorite rosebush

questions.text: what are two big words for "library" that Charles' tutor offers?
Dr. Yanina Zinchenko has a slight hint of an accent, what is it?
which 2 books are on Kyle's library card?
questions.answer: I Love You, Stinky Face and The Napping House

questions.text: what is the one rule Dr. Zinchenko tells to the essay winners?
what did Akimi's dad design in the new library?
questions.answer: The support structure for the vault door

questions.text: how old would Mrs. Gail Tobin (Head librarian of the Alexandraville public library in the 1960's) be if she were alive today?
in the computer game that features a medieval sewer, what surprising thing does the sewer smell like?
who is the first contestant to be eliminated from the game?
what is the extreme challenge in which Bridgette gets eliminated?
questions.answer: Name 4 books each by 10 authors in 2 minutes

questions.text: what color are the walls in the Young Adult room?
which character had ancestors that came to America on the Mayflower?
what famous person said "Outside of a dog a book is a man's best friend. Inside a dog it's too dark to read."?
who do Kyle and his teammates meet in the 590's - Zoology area?
what does Kyle's team read their second night in the Library?
who gets eliminated for stealing?
what 2 book titles are on the back of Sierra's library card?
questions.answer: The Westing Game and The Egypt Game

questions.text: what job does Charles's uncle Jimmy do?
questions.answer: Head Librarian of the Library of Congress

questions.text: what year did The Mixed Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler win the Newbery Medal?
what is the answer to the final clue "Once you learn how to do this, you will be forever free."?
does a character say a book was "originally written in Canadian"?
are characters told to bring "a sleeping bag, toothbrush, and a change of clothes... and consider bringing 2 pairs of underwear"?
does a character wear banana-peel slippers?
does a game have smell-a-vision?
